articles.title: Indian Overseas Bank increases FD interest rate for this tenor
articles.description: FD interest rates with a maturity of more than three years will now be 5.45 percent, up from 5.20 percent previously. IOB has not modified the interest rates on other FD tenor rates. The new interest rate will be in effect from March 10, 2022.
articles.content:
The Indian Overseas Bank has raised its longer-term deposit rates by 25 basis points, according to the banks website. The new interest rate will effective from March 10, 2022.
